tool.name: SAGA.table_calculus.9
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayORDER False isArrayFIELD False output_data_NOGAPS $output_data_NOGAPS name SAGA.table_calculus.9 TABLE $TABLE ORDER $ORDER FIELD $FIELD METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_NOGAPS $OutputSection_NOGAPS.outputType_NOGAPS transmissionMode_NOGAPS $OutputSection_NOGAPS.transmissionMode_NOGAPS

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: ORDER
param.label: Order
param.help: Order The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Field
param.help: Field The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_NOGAPS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: This tool fills gaps in the table records. for the chosen attribute field it interpolates values for those records, which have no-data, using existing data from the surrounding records. If no order field is specified, simply the record index is taken as coordinate, for which the interpolation will be performed. Notice: extrapolation is not supported, i.e. only those gaps will be filled that have lower and higher values surrounding them following the record order.
